pkgmetadata.longdescription: The latest flavour of the *dccm communication daemon, you need one and only one dccm running. Runned by superuser. Device connects to this daemon (to tcp port 5679). The odccm anounces connection and disconnection events. If device requires password, it will broadcast "PasswordFlagsChanged" over D-Bus and clients (e.g. synce-gnome, synce-engine) will provide odccm the password
